CreateServiceLinkedRoleForProduct.title: CreateServiceLinkedRoleForProduct
CreateServiceLinkedRoleForProduct.summary: Creates a service-linked role for your cloud service.

DeleteTargets.title: DeleteTargets
DeleteTargets.summary: Deletes one or more event targets of an event rule.

GetApiDestination.title: GetApiDestination
GetApiDestination.summary: Queries the information about an API destination.

GetConnection.title: GetConnection
GetConnection.summary: Queries the configurations of a connection.

GetEventBus.title: GetEventBus
GetEventBus.summary: Queries the detailed information about an event bus.

GetEventStreaming.title: GetEventStreaming
GetEventStreaming.summary: Queries the details of an event stream.

GetRule.title: GetRule
GetRule.summary: Queries the details of an event rule.

ListAliyunOfficialEventSources.title: ListAliyunOfficialEventSources
ListAliyunOfficialEventSources.summary: Queries all Alibaba Cloud service event sources.

ListApiDestinations.title: ListApiDestinations
ListApiDestinations.summary: Queries a list of API destinations.

ListRules.title: ListRules
ListRules.summary: Queries all rules of an event bus.

ListTargets.title: ListTargets
ListTargets.summary: Queries all event targets of an event rule.

PauseEventStreaming.title: PauseEventStreaming
PauseEventStreaming.summary: Stops an event stream that is running.

PutTargets.title: PutTargets
PutTargets.summary: Creates or updates event targets under a rule.

QueryEvent.title: QueryEvent
QueryEvent.summary: Queries the content of an event.

QueryTracedEventByEventId.title: QueryTracedEventByEventId
QueryTracedEventByEventId.summary: Queries event traces by event ID.

QueryTracedEvents.title: QueryTracedEvents
QueryTracedEvents.summary: Queries event traces by time range.

StartEventStreaming.title: StartEventStreaming
StartEventStreaming.summary: Enables a created or deactivated event stream.

TestEventPattern.title: TestEventPattern
TestEventPattern.summary: Checks whether the event pattern matches the provided JSON format.

UpdateEventStreaming.title: UpdateEventStreaming
UpdateEventStreaming.summary: Modifies the information about an event stream, such as the basic information and the information about the event source, event filtering rule, and event target.

UpdateRule.title: UpdateRule
UpdateRule.summary: Updates the configurations of an event rule.
